summary.para: The MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE structure contains information about an interactive logon profile.
This structure is used by the function.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.MessageType
member.summary: value identifying the type of profile data being returned. This member must be set to MsV1_0InteractiveProfile.

summary.para: Number of times the user is currently logged on.
summary.div: Note This value is not guaranteed to be accurate because the domain controller is not notified of all logons and logoffs.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.BadPasswordCount
member.summary: Number of times a password that is not valid was applied to the account since the last successful logon.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.LogonTime
member.summary: Time when the user last logged on. This is an absolute-format Windows standard time value.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.LogoffTime
member.summary: Time when the user should log off. This is an absolute-format Windows standard time value.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.KickOffTime
member.summary: Time when the system should force the user to log off. This is an absolute-format Windows standard time value. Note that Windows users are not forced to log off interactively; however, their network connections may be closed.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.PasswordLastSet
member.summary: Time and date the password was last changed. This is an absolute format Windows standard time value.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.PasswordCanChange
member.summary: Time and date when the user should be reminded to change passwords. This is an absolute-format Windows standard time value. This member is used by the GINA to display the prompt asking whether the user wants to change the current password.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.PasswordMustChange
member.summary: Time and date when the user must change the password. If the user can never change the password, this member is undefined. This is an absolute-format, Windows, standard time value.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.LogonScript
member.summary: containing the relative path to the account's logon script.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.HomeDirectory
member.summary: containing the home directory for the user.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.FullName
member.summary: containing the full name of the user.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.ProfilePath
member.summary: specifying the path to the user's roaming profile if the user has a roaming profile. For example: \SomeServer\SomeShare\MyUserName

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.HomeDirectoryDrive
member.summary: containing the drive letter (for example, C:\ or D:) of the home directory.

member.name: MSV1_0_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.LogonServer
member.summary: containing the name of the server that processed the logon request.

summary.para: Specifies how this user established the session. This can be the following flag.

listheader.description: The user logged on using extra security identifiers (SIDs).
